title: Poster, 1993-53-40, ca. 1980
inscribed: Imprinted in ink: "From the people who brought you the war in Vietnam, the contras in Nicaragua, death squads in El Salvador, the occupied West Bank and Gaza, the invasions of Panama and Grenada, the invasion of Lebanon, the bombing of Libya..." Imprinted in white ink at BC: "Produced by: Prairie Fire Organizing Committee.../Additional copies available from Liberation Graphics..."
creditline: Gift of Steven Heller and Karrie Jacobs
